body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons        Detail of the Frederick Girsch print Die Helden der Revolution, ca. 1850-1890.  General Washington stands with a group of officers, including the Polish patriots Casimir Pulaski and Thaddeus Kosciuszko. Library of Congress       The site is open on Saturdays and Sundays, from 12noon - 4pm, from April through October.
title: Thaddeus Kosciuszko National Memorial: Operating Hours & Seasons
